message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $7500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $7500 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to pay closer to $7000. Would you be willing to go a little lower?
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. How about $7200 for the product?
